title: Who is Lil Wayne’s dad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although Weezy has a father-son relationship with Birdman Jnr. Lil Wayne; takes after his father’s name Dwayne Michael Carter. It is reported that the father left the family and Wayne didn’t grow to know his dad. Although his dad is still alive, he refers to his stepdad Rabit as his real dad. Wayne has a tattoo in honor of his stepdad. The Grammy winner often refers to his dad in songs and doesn’t appear to be on good terms with him.

Dwayne Carter is the biological father of Lil Wayne, though the two are estranged. Rumors involving Lil Wayne and Birdman surface once again, stating that Baby fathered Lol Wayne… completely fabricated. Weezy credits his stepfather, Rabbit, who was murdered before the rappers rise to the top, with being his “real” father.
